item.description:
**Time has been changed from 7PM to 6PM. Dinner will be at six and then we can bowl! :-)**

********Ask for the meetup group, under the name of Jillian, at the front desk of the restaurant. We will all meet at the table since that will be a lot easier than meeting at the front door.********

I will send my cell phone number to all who have RSVPed yes so if you can't find us, please call me!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kings Bowling is a retro bowling place with 'comfort food with a kick.'

You can see the menu for it online, let me know if anyone has any issues with it.

It's 21+ after 6 PM so bring your IDs.

This should be fun! :-)
item.name: Bowling at Kings, Boston, MA
